import { Nav } from "./components/Nav" import { Header } from "./components/Header" import { AboutUs } from "./components/AboutUs" import styled from "styled-components" import { Structure } from "./components/Structure" import { Contact } from "./components/Contact" import { Footer } from "./components/Footer" import { NavOption, navOptions, SectionName, structureItems } from "./data" import { Certifications } from "./components/Certifications" import { colors } from "./variables" function App() { const BodyWrapper = styled.div` padding: 0 25rem; ` const onNavClick = (option: NavOption) => { const anchor = document.querySelector(`#${option.id}`) anchor?.scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth", block: 'center', inline: 'end'}) } return (
) } export default App
